section_hero.title: Universal messaging, with you at its core.
section_hero.description: We are hard at work experimenting, and finding the best way to build Uplink and Warp, our chat app and interface-driven, distributed data service. Our goal is to build a communication platform that give you peace of mind with end-to-end encryption, without sacrificing quality. Being peer-to-peer, your only limit is your network own connection.

uplink_section.title: Learn More about Uplink
uplink_section.description: Uplink is our chat app, utilizing Warp, which uses technologies like IPFS/libp2p and public key cryptography. It's the UI layer on top of Warp and it's built to make sure you are in control of your data. No trackers! It's a work in progress, but we are providing rolling updates.

warp_section.title: Check out Warp!
warp_section.description: Plug and Play for chat! Warp is our interface-first, platform agnostic, peer-driven architecture, distributed, encrypted data service. Phew. What a mouthful. Breaking it down we wanted a core spec that would define all of the features of our chat app that would work across platforms. And of course the actual implementation of that spec had to be as fast possible. So we chose a low level language, Rust, that happens to also compile across platforms (thanks LLVM!), including the web. Think of Warp as the 'back end' in a world where there are no back ends!

description.one: Satellite is to be secure down to its core. We utilize leading decentralization and encryption technology to provide a platform to build extensible apps you can tailor with custom mods and extensions to make them your own. All of this, coupled with top to bottom encryption, makes your journey in the digital world a bit less scary and frustrating.
description.two: All of that, of course, comes with no compromises. Satellite ships with huge file sharing and stunning quality voice and video we know you'll love.

multi_platform.title: Multi-Platform
multi_platform.description: Satellite is about more than just a universal chat app. Satellite is built to be offline-first so your conversation is never left unheard. From mobile, desktop, your favorite games, and beyond, Satellite lets you take ownership of your digital identity, so all your comms move with you.

chat.title: Multi Platform chat
chat.description: Chat anywhere with our cross platform app.

sharing.title: Easy File sharing
sharing.description: Share files instantly with friends, with no file size limit (beyond your own local drive size)

serverless.title: Decentralized and Peer-to-peer
serverless.description: Your data goes straight to your friends, nobody tracking in the middle.

description.one: Satellite is nearing early access. If you'd like to be a part of building the future of messaging with us, give Satellite a try and join our journey. Satellite's early access is available now!
description.two: For this Early Access, we recommend using the desktop/browser version, just navigate to https://core.satellite.im to get started.
